import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const ReturnPolicy = () => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return (

Return Policy

30-Day Return Window

We offer a 30-day return window from the date of delivery. Items must be returned in their original condition with all tags attached.

Return Conditions

  • Items must be unworn and in original packaging
  • All original tags and labels must be attached
  • Shoes must not show signs of wear or damage
  • Original receipt or proof of purchase required

How to Return

  1. Contact our customer service team
  2. Receive return authorization and shipping label
  3. Package items securely in original box
  4. Ship using provided return label

Refund Process

Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your returned items. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method.

Exchanges

We offer free exchanges for different sizes or colors within 30 days. Contact us to arrange an exchange.

Contact Us

For returns or exchanges, contact us at:

Email: returns@shoecollection.com

Phone: (+91) 12345 67890

Hours: Monday - Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM
); }; export default ReturnPolicy;
